# Leather
## Overview
Leather armor is made up of pieces of hard boiled leather carefully sewn together.


-tx-
| |  | **Armor/** | **Maximum** | **Armor** |  |  ||  |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| |  | **Shield** | **Dex** | **Check** | **Arcane Spell** | **Speed** ||  |
| **Armor** | **Cost** | **Bonus** | **Bonus** | **Penalty** | **Failure Chance** | **30 ft.** | **20 ft.** | **Weight** |
| *Light armor* |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Leather | 10 gp | +2 | +6 | 0 | 10% | 30 ft. | 20 ft. | 15 lbs. |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 151
